actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 94-1541.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 2004 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to eliminate a restriction on use of certain lands patented to the city of Hobart, Kiowa County, Okla.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the City of Hobart, Oklahoma, all remaining interest of the United States in specified lands and to issue a new patent without restriction for such lands upon being satisfied that the city will set aside lands of at least comparable value for school purposes.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate a restriction on use of certain lands patented to the city of Hobart, Kiowa County, Okla.
